EditTextPreference.android:title: Roblu Cloud username
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Set your name, this will appear on everyone's devices next to scouting data you've edited.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Server IP
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Set the IP address if you're using a custom server. Leave blank for the official Roblu Cloud server.

ListPreference.android:title: Auto checkout
ListPreference.android:summary: Setup this device to automatically checkout certain assignments. This option is for teams using a strict six scouting device setup.

Preference.android:title: Setup device
Preference.android:summary: This option will search for nearby Bluetooth devices and allow you to add devices to the auto-connect list.

Preference.android:title: Privacy and terms
Preference.android:summary: View troubleshooting, console commands, how Roblu handles your data, and the terms of use.
